title: Billions Co-Executive Producer on Crisis Response
itunes:title: Billions Co-Executive Producer on Crisis Response
description:
April Taylor, Co-Executive Producer of Billions, discusses efforts of the newly created New York Producers COVID Response Alliance and the upcoming season of the show.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
